name: MorphoBot War: Steel Robots 3D
description:
Welcome to the Steel World, where robots have invaded the city in all possible forms!
Choose your robot and transform it to overcome all obstacles you find in this open world.
You can transform into a dolphin, to swim through the sea and destroy all your enemies inside and outside the ocean.
Find your opponents in the radar map, protect the city and don't let the evil robots escape!
You can play different levels and missions, will you be able to win all of them?

Game Features:
- Real graphics
- Different transforming robots to choose with different skills
- Different levels with action missions
- Smooth & easy controls for extreme fun
- High quality 3D graphics in this simulator!

Play with your friends and show them who is the best Transform Robot ever!
What are you waiting for? Download this game for free and start killing the enemies to protect the city from the robots attack!
